title: CESC 2017
details: Jae Kwon opens CESC 2017 with a keynote about Cosmos and cryptoeconomics. Find our booth at the Pauley Ballroom at UC Berkeley, California.

title: M-0
details: Sunny Aggarwal, Research Scientist at Tendermint will be speaking at M-0 about Cosmos. Find him at Park Hotel in Zug, Switzerland.

title: Devcon3
details: The Cosmos team will be at Devcon3. Find our booth at the Cancún International Convention Center (ICC), Cancún, Mexico.
